overview: After months of awkward exchanges and arguments, childhood sweethearts Lucy and Alex finally decide that their relationship in adulthood just isn’t working. Having been friends since they were very young, Lucy is unsure of how to go about life without Alex. She begins her journey to find her inner self love, amour de soi, and begins to fall in love with life, and herself, without the reliance on anyone else.
tagline: One girl’s journey to find her self love, amour de soi, and fall in love with life once again.
title: Amour de Soi
